Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in a poker game. A player has an ID, a hand of cards, a stack of chips, and some states like whether they've folded or are ready.

      Constructor for creating a player with a specified ID and initial stack of chips.

      initialStack - The initial number of chips the player has.

      Parameters:

      hand - The player's hand of cards.
      initialStack - The initial number of chips the player has.

    • placeBet

      public boolean placeBet(int amount)
      Method to place a bet. Deducts the specified amount from the player's stack.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to bet.
      Returns:
      true if the player has enough chips, false otherwise.
